name: elasticache-client
author: Arnout Kazemier; Natalia Angulo <nataliaangulo93@gmail.com>; Guillermo Men√©ndez <guillermo.menendez@dive.tv>
description: A fully featured Memcached API client with consistent key hashing and node autodiscovery, supporting both single and clustered Memcached servers through consistent hashing and failover/failure. Memcached is rewrite of nMemcached, which will be deprecated in the near future.
